SELECT A.BIN_CampaignRuleID, A.SubCampaignCode, A.SubCampaignName, A.SubCampaignType, A.DeliveryPrice, A.DeliveryPoints, B.CampaignCode, B.CampaignName, B.GotCounter, B.CampaignSetBy FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_Campaign B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignID = B.BIN_CampaignID AND B.BIN_BrandInfoID = #BIN_BrandInfoID# AND B.CampaignOrderFromDate IS NOT NULL AND B.ValidFlag = '1') WHERE A.State = '1' AND A.ValidFlag = '1' AND (B.WechatFlag IS NULL OR B.WechatFlag = '1')
A.SubCampaignCode = #SubCampCode#
B.CampaignCode = #CampCode#
A.SubCampaignType = #Type#

SELECT A.CounterCode FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID AND B.Type = '4' AND B.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN (
)E ON(E.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE B.BIN_CityID = #cityId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT D.CounterCode FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo D WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN (
)E ON(E.BIN_OrganizationID = D.BIN_OrganizationID) WHERE D.BIN_ChannelID = #channelId# AND D.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.BasePropValue1 AS propValue, B.PropertyName AS propName FROM Campaign.BIN_CamRuleCondition A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignBaseProp B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignBasePropID = B.BIN_CampaignBasePropID AND B.PropertyName IN('baseProp_city','baseProp_counter','baseProp_channal') AND B.ValidFlag ='1') WHERE A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = #BIN_CampaignRuleID# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT C.UnitCode AS unitCode, B.BarCode AS barCode, A.SaleType AS prtType, A.Price AS price, A.Quantity AS quantity, CASE WHEN A.LogicOpt != '' THEN A.LogicOpt ELSE 'AND' END AS logicOpt, CASE WHEN A.GroupType != '' THEN A.GroupType ELSE 'AND' END AS groupType, CASE WHEN A.GroupNo != 0 THEN A.GroupNo ELSE 1 END AS groupNo, '' AS cateType, 0 AS exPoint, ISNULL(A.DeliveryType,'') AS deliveryType FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_ProductVendorID = B.BIN_ProductVendorID) JOIN Basis.BIN_Product C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B.BIN_ProductID = C.BIN_ProductID) WHERE A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = #BIN_CampaignRuleID# AND A.SaleType = 'N' AND A.ValidFlag = '1' UNION SELECT C.UnitCode AS unitCode, B.BarCode AS barCode, A.SaleType AS prtType, A.Price AS price, A.Quantity AS quantity, CASE WHEN A.LogicOpt != '' THEN A.LogicOpt ELSE 'AND' END AS logicOpt, CASE WHEN A.GroupType != '' THEN A.GroupType ELSE 'AND' END AS groupType, CASE WHEN A.GroupNo != 0 THEN A.GroupNo ELSE 1 END AS groupNo, ISNULL(C.PromotionCateCD,'') AS cateType, ISNULL(C.ExPoint,0) AS exPoint, ISNULL(A.DeliveryType,'') AS deliveryType FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_ProductVendorID = B.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID) JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B.BIN_PromotionProductID = C.BIN_PromotionProductID) WHERE A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = #BIN_CampaignRuleID# AND A.SaleType = 'P' AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT DISTINCT C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AS ruleId, B.ActivityCode AS activityCode, B.ActivityName AS activityName, ISNULL(B.DescriptionDtl,'') AS description, D.ActLocationType AS locationType, CASE WHEN E.BIN_OrganizationID = -8888 THEN 'ALL' ELSE F.CounterCode END AS counterCode, CONVERT(NVARCHAR, E.ActivityFromDate, 120) AS fromDate, CONVERT(NVARCHAR, E.ActivityToDate, 120) AS toDate FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionActGrp A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivity B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_PromotionActGrpID = B.BIN_PromotionActGrpID and (B.TemplateFlag IS NULL OR B.TemplateFlag='0' OR B.TemplateFlag ='') AND B.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionActivityRule C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B.BIN_PromotionActivityID = C.BIN_PromotionActivityID AND C.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleCondition D WITH(NOLOCK) ON(C.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = D.BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID AND D.ActLocationType IS NOT NULL AND D.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Promotion.BIN_ActivityTransHis E WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B.ActivityCode = E.MainCode AND A.GroupCode = E.SubjectCode AND E.ActivityToDate >=GETDATE() AND E.ActivityType = '0' AND E.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo F WITH(NOLOCK) ON(E.BIN_OrganizationID = F.BIN_OrganizationID AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = F.BIN_BrandInfoID) WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #BIN_BrandInfoID# AND A.ActivityType = 'CXHD'

SELECT PromotionPrtCode AS barCode, PromotionPrtUnitcode AS unitCode, BIN_ProductVendorID AS prtId, Price AS price, Quantity AS quantity, SaleType AS prtType, GroupType AS groupType FROM Promotion.BIN_PromotionRuleResult D WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_PromotionActivityRuleID = #ruleId# AND ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT BookTimeRange FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_BrandInfoID = #BIN_BrandInfoID# AND CounterGot = #CounterCodeGet# AND BookDate = #BookDate# AND ValidFlag = '1'
State = #State#
State IN
#StateArr[]#

WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #BIN_BrandInfoID# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'
A.TradeNoIF = #BillNo#
A.CampaignCode = #CampCode#
A.CampaignCode IN
#CampCodeArr[]#
A.Mobile = #Mobile#
A.BIN_CampaignOrderID IN ( select X.BIN_CampaignOrderID from Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder X WITH(NOLOCK) where X.MessageId=#MessageId# union select X.BIN_CampaignOrderID from Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder X WITH(NOLOCK) where X.BIN_MemberInfoID = (select top 1 D.BIN_MemberInfoID from Members.BIN_MemCardInfo D WITH(NOLOCK) where D.MemCode = #MemCode#) )
A.BIN_MemberInfoID = (select top 1 D.BIN_MemberInfoID from Members.BIN_MemCardInfo D WITH(NOLOCK) where D.MemCode = #MemCode#)
A.MessageId = #MessageId#
A.State = #State#
A.State IN
#StateArr[]#
A.SubType = #SubType#
A.CouponCode = #CouponCode#
A.CounterGot IN (#CounterCodeGet#,'ALL')
A.BookDate >= #BookFromDate#
A.BookDate <= #BookToDate#
A.CampaignOrderTime >= #OrderFromDate#
A.CampaignOrderTime <= #OrderToDate#
A.FinishTime >= #FinishFromDate#

EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrderDetail C WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE C.MainCode = #SubCampCode# AND A.BIN_CampaignOrderID = C.BIN_CampaignOrderID AND C.ValidFlag = '1')

SELECT A.BIN_CampaignOrderID, A.TradeNoIF, A.CampaignCode, A.CouponCode, A.MemCode, A.Name, A.Mobile, A.State, A.SubType, A.CounterGot, counter.CounterNameIF, A.PointRequired, A.Quantity, A.BookTimeRange, A.DataChannel, ISNULL(A.DeliveryMothod,'2') AS DeliveryMothod, A.DeliveryAddress, A.DeliveryState, A.RelationNo, CONVERT(varchar,A.CampaignOrderTime,120) AS OrderTime, CONVERT(varchar,A.CancelTime,120) AS CancelTime, CONVERT(varchar,A.FinishTime,120) AS FinishTime, CONVERT(varchar,A.BookDate,23) AS BookDate, CONVERT(varchar,A.GetFromTime,120) AS GetFromTime, CONVERT(varchar,A.GetToTime,120) AS GetToTime, B.CampaignName, A.ReceiverName, A.ReceiverMobile, A.DeliveryProvince, A.DeliveryCity, A.DeliveryCounty FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_Campaign B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.CampaignCode = B.CampaignCode AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = B.BIN_BrandInfoID) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo counter WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.CounterGot = counter.CounterCode
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder A WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT A.UnitCode, A.BarCode, A.Quantity, A.Amout AS Price, A.PointRequired AS ExPoint, A.MainCode, case when A.GiftType = 'N' then Y.NameTotal else N.NameTotal end AS PrtName, A.GiftType AS PrtType, B.SubCampaignName, B.Description FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrderDetail A WITH(NOLOCK) Left JOIN [Campaign].[BIN_CampaignRule] B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.MainCode = B.SubCampaignCode) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor X WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_Product Y WITH(NOLOCK) ON X.BIN_ProductID = Y.BIN_ProductID ON A.BIN_ProductVendorID = X.BIN_ProductVendorID AND A.GiftType = 'N' LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor M WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct N WITH(NOLOCK) ON M.BIN_PromotionProductID = N.BIN_PromotionProductID ON A.BIN_ProductVendorID = M.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID AND A.GiftType = 'P' WHERE A.BIN_CampaignOrderID = #BIN_CampaignOrderID# AND A.ValidFlag = '1'

UPDATE Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder SET State = #State#,
SendFlag = CASE SendFlag WHEN '1' THEN '2' ELSE SendFlag END,
MqWaitFlag = CASE WHEN #State# = 'CA' AND MqWaitFlag = '0' THEN '1' WHEN #state# = 'CA' and MqWaitFlag = '1' THEN '0' ELSE MqWaitFlag END,
CancelTime = CASE #State# WHEN 'CA' THEN #OptTime# ELSE CancelTime END, FinishTime = CASE #State# WHEN 'OK' THEN #OptTime# ELSE NULL END, ModifyCount = ModifyCount +1 WHERE TradeNoIF = #BillNo# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #BIN_BrandInfoID#
sqlMap.select: SELECT State FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE TradeNoIF = #BillNo# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #BIN_BrandInfoID# AND ValidFlag = '1'

SELECT A.SubCampaignCode AS subCampCode, 'P' AS prtType, B.UnitCode AS unitCode, B.BarCode AS barCode, B.BIN_ProductVendorID AS proId, B.Quantity AS quantity, B.Price * -1 AS price, C.ExPoint AS exPoint, C.IsStock AS isStock FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = B.BIN_CampaignRuleID AND B.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(b.UnitCode = C.UnitCode AND C.PromotionCateCD = #prmCate#) WHERE A.SubCampaignCode = #subCampCode#

SELECT A.SubCampaignCode AS subCampCode, 'P' AS prtType, B.UnitCode AS unitCode, B.BarCode AS barCode, B.BIN_ProductVendorID AS proId, 1 AS quantity, 0 AS price, 0 AS exPoint, C.IsStock AS isStock FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = B.BIN_CampaignRuleID AND B.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(b.UnitCode = C.UnitCode AND C.PromotionCateCD = 'DHCP') WHERE A.SubCampaignCode IN
#subCampCodeArr[]#

BIN_MemberInfoID = #MemberInfoID#,
MemCode = #MemCode#,
Mobile = #Mobile#,
Telephone = #Telephone#,

BookDate = #BookDate#,

sqlMap.select: SELECT C.BIN_ProductVendorID AS proId, C.SaleType AS prtType, C.UnitCode AS unitCode, C.BarCode AS barCode, C.Quantity AS quantity, E.PromotionCateCD AS prmCateCode, CASE WHEN E.PromotionCateCD IN('TZZK','DHCP','DHMY') THEN ISNULL(C.Price,0) * -1 ELSE ISNULL(C.Price,0) END AS price, #subCampCode# AS subCampCode FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_Campaign B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignID = B.BIN_CampaignID) JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignRuleResult C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignRuleID = C.BIN_CampaignRuleID AND C.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor D WITH(NOLOCK) ON(C.BIN_ProductVendorID=D.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID AND C.SaleType = 'P') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct E WITH(NOLOCK) ON (D.BIN_PromotionProductID=E.BIN_PromotionProductID) WHERE A.SubCampaignCode = #subCampCode# AND B.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#
sqlMap.sql: WHERE SubCampCode = #subCampCode# AND BIN_OrganizationID = #departId# AND BIN_ProductVendorID = #proId# AND prtType = #prtType# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND ValidFlag = '1'

select DISTINCT A.CampaignCode AS CampCode, B.MainCode AS SubCampCode, C.SubCampaignName AS SubCampName, C.Description, A.CouponCode, A.State, A.SubType, A.CounterGot AS CounterCode, CONVERT(varchar,A.CampaignOrderTime,120) AS OrderTime, CONVERT(varchar,A.CancelTime,120) AS CancelTime, CONVERT(varchar,A.FinishTime,120) AS FinishTime, CONVERT(varchar,A.GetFromTime,120) AS GetFromTime, CONVERT(varchar,A.GetToTime,120) AS GetToTime FROM Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrder A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignOrderDetail B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_CampaignOrderID = B.BIN_CampaignOrderID AND B.ValidFlag = '1') JOIN Campaign.BIN_CampaignRule C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B.MainCode = C.SubCampaignCode)
